1212550.name: EVECTOR, Acid Thirst
1212550.description:
Somewhere far in space ... on a hostile acid planet ... there is only one way to escape!
Break through the dangerous regions of the acid planet.
Fight "Aciders" and vicious fauna to escape the acid planet in our modern-classic FPS!

Features

  • 9 square kilometers of playable open world
  • fifeteen types of enemies
  • classic retro brown aesthetic
  • two controllable vehicles (boat and a sliding vehicle)



The game contains retro graphics inspired by other FPS games from the late nineties / early 2000s, however, it uses the capabilities offered by modern game engines, such as large open spaces.



If you like old arcade FPS games, but you have already completed all the games of this kind known to you, this game is for you.

Previews

  • E1M1 Magazine - Issue #4 "feels like a true labour of love"
  • View early demo Curator reviews:
